Title: The Earthquake
Writer: Marta Kauffman (created by), Howard J. Morris (created by), Jacquelyn Reingold, Laura Jacqmin (story editor)
Actors: Jane Fonda, Lily Tomlin, Sam Waterston, Martin Sheen
Plot: Sol takes care of Frankie after she has an earthquake freak-out, while Grace goes on her first date. Coyote pays Mallory a surprise visit.
